class_notes:
This course builds on the tools and concepts of painting. This course incorporates intermediate levels of conceptual and aesthetic awareness, creative problem solving, aesthetics and critical thinking with an emphasis on the 20th and 21st century aesthetic practices.
Prerequisite: ARTVIS 105 or permission of the instructor: katherine.patrice.taylor@emory.edu


(Prerequisite: XXX)


(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
course_description: This course builds on the tools and concepts of painting. This course incorporates intermediate levels of conceptual and aesthetic awareness, creative problem solving, aesthetics and critical thinking with an emphasis on the 20th and 21st century aesthetic practices.
prerequisites: This course requires ARTVIS 105 or ARTVIS 104 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
